description: Episode number 16 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". The role that learning plays in the lives of children, the functions of schooling and children's orientation toward mastery and achievement are addressed as events surrounding the child's first day of school in Japan, Russia, Brazil and the U.S. are observed. Discusses variables that enhance learning and promote competence.
